short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It gives you confetti when you merge a pull request or resolve a merge conflict

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a fun and rewarding experience while contributing to your team's codebase with our extension! Every time you merge a pull request or resolve a merge conflict, our extension adds a confetti celebration to your screen. This small but delightful feature will make your development process more enjoyable and motivate you to keep improving the project. Join the celebration and download our extension today!
